title: Yoshinobu Akao
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Akao was born in <a href="Yamanashi%20Prefecture">Yamanashi Prefecture</a> on October 3, 1975. After graduating from <a href="Asia%20University%20%28Japan%29">Asia University</a>, he joined <a href="Japan%20Football%20League%20%281992%E2%80%9398%29">Japan Football League</a> club <a href="Ventforet%20Kofu">Ventforet Kofu</a> in 1998. The club was promoted to new league <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> from 1999. Although he played many matches as substitute midfielder in 1999, he could hardly play in the match in 2000 and retired end of 2000 season.
